plot: Dorothy and Bob DeBolt's tale of the struggles and joys involved in their 19 adopted children, many of who are physically disabled war orphans.
title: Who Are the DeBolts? [And Where Did They Get 19 Kids?]
plot_es: Dorothy and Bob DeBolt's tale of the struggles and joys involved in their 19 adopted children, many of who are physically disabled war orphans.
original_name: Who Are the DeBolts? [And Where Did They Get 19 Kids?]
plot_en: Dorothy and Bob DeBolt's tale of the struggles and joys involved in their 19 adopted children, many of who are physically disabled war orphans.
